algorithm_technique: Greedy approach: iterate through the string, count consecutive characters, and append count and character when limit (9) is reached or character changes.
problem_summary_simple: Compress a string by grouping consecutive identical characters up to 9 times.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the string, maintaining a count of consecutive characters. Append count and character when count reaches 9 or the next character differs.
key_insights: The greedy choice of taking the longest possible prefix (up to 9) is optimal.
A single pass through the string is sufficient.
Careful handling of the end of the string is needed.
